Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of The Human Meteor and Initial Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the main character, The Human Meteor, his alter ego Duke, and the initial conflict involving pursuit and ambush at the pier, leading to his transformation and first action.

sub_scenes.title: Cover Introduction
sub_scenes.description: The comic book cover introduces the hero and the underwater setting, establishing the premise and initial conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Duke's Taxi Ride and Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Duke starts his day as a taxi driver, picks up fares, and is then pursued and attacked, setting up the need for his transformation.

narrative_arcs.title: Pursuit and Ambush at the Pier

sub_scenes.title: Human Meteor's First Action and Police Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor confronts his attackers, deals with them, and is then praised by the police who arrive at the scene.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Briefing and Yacht Infiltration Plan
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor receives a briefing in the hospital about a yacht and G-Man Holden, leading to a plan for Duke to infiltrate the yacht.

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Infiltration and Submarine Mission
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Toby's undercover mission on the yacht, the discovery of the submarine, and Human Meteor's underwater intervention to stop the enemy's plan.

sub_scenes.title: Toby's Undercover Mission and Capture
sub_scenes.description: Toby, undercover as 'Pete', acts on the yacht, searches for clues, and is eventually discovered and captured.

narrative_arcs.title: Return, Submarine Discovery, and Mission Reveal

sub_scenes.title: Human Meteor's Submarine Intervention and Underwater Combat
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor dives to investigate the submarine, discovers the threat, and engages in underwater combat with enemy divers.

sub_scenes.title: Ship Reaction and Human Meteor's Surface Attack
sub_scenes.description: The ship reacts to the underwater explosion, and Human Meteor shifts his focus to attacking the ship itself.

Major_Arcs.title: Investigation and Resolution of Human Meteor Storyline
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the Human Meteor storyline by focusing on the investigation on the yacht, informing the Navy, and a final domestic scene.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Investigation and Depth Map Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor boards the yacht, investigates Peter's fate, and searches for a depth map in Peter's cabin.

narrative_arcs.title: Informing the Navy about Peter's Map

sub_scenes.title: Speedboat, Hospital Visit, and Domestic Scene
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor and Toby travel by speedboat, visit Holden in the hospital, and conclude the day with a domestic scene at home.

narrative_arcs.title: Evening Drive and Bedtime for Toby

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads and the Ambulance Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Liberty Lads in combat and then shifts to a street-level mystery involving an ambulance and two boys who find a clue.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads in Combat
sub_scenes.description: The Liberty Lads are introduced fighting against 'Nazi fiends' in an action-packed scene.

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance Arrival and Wallet Clue
sub_scenes.description: Two boys observe an ambulance arrival and then discover a dropped wallet, which becomes a crucial clue.

narrative_arcs.title: Wallet Discovery and Bus Garage Clue

sub_scenes.title: Bus Garage and Major Bronson Encounter
sub_scenes.description: The boys go to the bus garage and witness a marine saluting a civilian, learning about Major Bronson.

sub_scenes.title: Chasing the Bus and Police Intervention
sub_scenes.description: The boys chase a bus to return the wallet but are intercepted by a policeman who takes them to Mr. Horst.

narrative_arcs.title: Chasing the Bus for Wallet Return
Waiting on the Bench and Approaching Threat

Major_Arcs.title: Mr. Horst's Interrogation and Major Bronson's Intervention
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the interrogation of the boys by Mr. Horst, the reveal of a violent plan against them, and the unexpected intervention of Major Bronson.

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Violent Plan
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Horst interrogates the boys about the wallet, disbelieves their story, and a violent plan against them is proposed.

sub_scenes.title: Capture, Threat, and Bronson's Violent Turn
sub_scenes.description: A fight breaks out, the boys are captured and threatened by Mr. Horst, but Major Bronson unexpectedly turns violent.

narrative_arcs.title: Initial Melee and Call to Stop

Major_Arcs.title: Escape, Sabotage Plans, and Marine Barracks Attack
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the boys' escape, the discovery of sabotage plans, and the subsequent attack on the Marine Barracks.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Marine Help and Sabotage Discovery
sub_scenes.description: One boy seeks help from a Marine sergeant while the other discovers sabotage plans in a secret office.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Marine Help at the Waterfront
Discovery and Confrontation in the Secret Office

sub_scenes.title: Attack on Marine Barracks and Cornering Skip
sub_scenes.description: The Marine Barracks is attacked, and Skip attempts to defend himself before being cornered.

Major_Arcs.title: Marine Intervention and Resolution of Nazi Plot
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc culminates in the Marines intervening, fighting the Nazi agents, rescuing Major Bronson, and resolving the Nazi spy ring plot.

sub_scenes.title: Marine Combat and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Marines arrive and engage in combat with the Nazi agents, leading to the immediate aftermath and concern for Major Bronson.

narrative_arcs.title: Resolution and Congratulations for Stopping Nazi Spies

Major_Arcs.title: Champ and Henry in South American Intrigue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Champ and Henry in South America, caught in intrigue related to Axis agents and Rosita's kidnapping.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Arrival in South America
sub_scenes.description: Champ and Henry are introduced in a desert action scene and then arrive in a South American town where Americans are noted to be at a hotel.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of Champ and Henry in Intrigue

sub_scenes.title: Officers' Suspicious Actions and Rosita's Kidnapping Explanation
sub_scenes.description: Officers are shown acting suspiciously, arresting and questioning civilians, before explaining to Champ and Henry about Rosita's kidnapping by El Tigre.

narrative_arcs.title: Escort to Consul and Investigation Inquiry
Explanation of Rosita's Kidnapping and Suspicion

Major_Arcs.title: Rosita's Rescue Mission
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the plan to rescue Rosita, the infiltration of El Tigre's hideout, combat with Nazi agents, and the successful rescue.

sub_scenes.title: Planning and Infiltration of El Tigre's Hideout
sub_scenes.description: A plan is formed to locate El Tigre, and the group infiltrates his hideout using a diversion.

narrative_arcs.title: Planning the Approach to El Tigre
Approaching Guards and Confrontation with El Tigre

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation, Misunderstanding, and Rescue Mission Start
sub_scenes.description: Interrogation of a captured man reveals a twist about Axis agents, a misunderstanding about El Tigre is clarified, and the rescue mission for Rosita is launched.

narrative_arcs.title: Interrogation and Twist Regarding Axis Agents
Misunderstanding and Clarification about El Tigre
Rosita's Location Revealed and Rescue Mission Initiated

sub_scenes.title: Combat and Resolution of Rosita's Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Close combat ensues, Rosita is rescued, gratitude is expressed, and government troops arrive, resolving the immediate kidnapping plot.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival of Government Forces and Manhunt

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan in Jungle Action and Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Devil Dog Dolan in jungle combat, reveals a military briefing about his disobedience, depicts his capture, torture, and the resolution of the conflict with natives.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Military Briefing
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan is introduced in jungle combat, followed by a military briefing discussing his actions and disobedience.

narrative_arcs.title: Jungle Combat and Introduction of Devil Dog Dolan
Reassurance and Trust in Dolan's Intentions

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Arrival, Ambush, and Capture
sub_scenes.description: Dolan arrives in the jungle, is observed, and another character is ambushed and captured by natives.

sub_scenes.title: Torture for Plans and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Suspicion arises about Dolan, orders are given for interrogation, and a captured soldier (Dolan) is tortured to extract plans.

sub_scenes.title: Native Huts Fire and Resolution with Natives
sub_scenes.description: Arson occurs, marine attacks, and Dolan resolves conflict with natives after their chief's death, setting up pursuit of Grauer.

narrative_arcs.title: Marine's Attack and Attempt to Stop Him
Burning Native Huts and Flames' Surge
Arsonist's Gloating and Reassurance to Sam
Chief's Death and Native Homage to Marine
Explanation of Chief's Betrayal and Liberation
Post-Conflict Dialogue and Pursuit of Grauer

Major_Arcs.title: Captain's Dilemma, Sam's Onslaught, and Dolan's Discipline
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the Captain's internal conflict, his son Sam's violent reaction, and Dolan's disciplinary action as a form of resolution.

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Decision and Sam's Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: The Captain decides to surrender plans, leading to a confrontation with his son Sam and Sam's aggressive reaction.

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins and the Murder Mystery Begins
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins and the initial murder mystery they are assigned to investigate, starting with the news assignment.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Twinkle Twins and Newspaper Assignment
sub_scenes.description: The Twinkle Twins are introduced, and they receive their first assignment to investigate a banker's murder.

narrative_arcs.title: The News Assignment and Initial Clues
Hospital Investigation and Miss Reilly's Condition
Phoning Elijah from the Candy Store

Major_Arcs.title: Hospital and Blood Transfusion for Tom Reilly
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the search for Tom Reilly, the medical emergency, community blood donation, and Reilly's eventual recovery.

sub_scenes.title: Searching for Reilly and Mrs. Murphy's Information
sub_scenes.description: Dan and Diane search for Tom Reilly in the Irish section, where they meet Mrs. Murphy who provides crucial information and exonerates Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Tom Reilly in the Irish Section
Farnacci's Blood Transfusion and Mob Threat
Diagnosis: Blood Transfusion Needed for Mrs. Murphy
Seeking Blood Donors and Initial Mismatch
Urgent Call for Blood Donors for Tom Reilly
Community Response and Arrival of Blood Donors
Blood Type Verification and Donation Process
Blood Transfusion and Tom Reilly's Recovery
Anticipation of Tom Reilly Revealing Information

Major_Arcs.title: Justice for Farnacci and Birthday Celebration
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the Twinkle Twins storyline with the pursuit and apprehension of Farnacci and a celebratory birthday party for Reilly's daughter, marking a happy resolution.

sub_scenes.title: Pursuit and Arrest of Farnacci
sub_scenes.description: Demands for justice lead to a police pursuit and raid to arrest Farnacci and his gang.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Justice and Plan to Capture Farnacci
Police Pursuit and Raid to Arrest Farnacci
Confrontation and Apprehension at the Poolroom
Celebratory Birthday Party for Reilly's Daughter
